channel.title: How do i change the back ground on a client
channel.description: on my 508 client i want to change the back ground but i dont know how and i dont know where to look

item.title: How do i change the back ground on a client
item.dc:creator: @ninjaxr ninjaxr
item.description:
@ninjaxr wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:4, topic:306624”][quote author=ninjaxr link=topic=402768.msg2983984#msg2983984 date=1254845676]

Look in sprites.

Well i got a client that doesnt have no images in sprite dude it just shows the runescape image and i think theres no way to change it he might have one like mine, would anybody know if there is some way with these type?
[/quote]oh … i will leave it then[/quote]
ok if you find a way of changing these please tell me

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the back ground on a client
